title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA)
Interview Descriptions: Zoom interview and just ask simple questions. I felt I didn’t do too well to fit the criteria but I appreciate for the chance of interview. It was about 30 minutes
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself and what do you like to do

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CHOC Children's
Interview Descriptions: One interview was with a human resource specialist. After this, I was scheduled for a second interview which consisted of a panel of managers, educators and current nurses. Anyone was able to ask me questions/give me feedback.
Interview Questions: 1. Tell me about yourself 2. Tell me about a conflict with a coworker or LIP 3. How have you made friends at your current job 4. What are your typical patient assignments 5. Tell me about a super critical patient or a code

title: Referral Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at CHOC Children's in May 2023
Interview Descriptions: Waited 10 mins after start time for interview to begin Remote with 2 person panel manager and lead looking for lots of experience and just asks a lot of scenario based questions.
Interview Questions: Tell us about yourself Describe a time you had to deal with difficult patient

title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA) in Apr 2023
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was on zoom and lasted about 20-30 minutes. There were three people interviewing me over zoom. It was very easy process and they were kind. It was a bit intimidating but that may differ per unit
Interview Questions: What are two of your strengths and two weaknesses

title: Sr. accountant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at CHOC Children's
Interview Descriptions: First interview was scheduled via zoom with the Controller. The interview lasted for about 30 minutes. She was very friendly and detailed in what the position required. She asked about my future career goals, and career background.
Interview Questions: What was the biggest challenge you faced in your career?

title: Chaplain Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at CHOC Children's
Interview Descriptions: It was a very clear and smooth process. I was able to have the initial screening over the phone and have the main interview over Zoom. Communication and expectations were clear and set.
Interview Questions: What was you most difficult patient case?

title: SLP Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at CHOC Children's
Interview Descriptions: multistep process- including. phone screening, zoom interviews with panel of speech therapy team and mgmt rep present for fully remote interview process over the course of several weeks that required several encounters
Interview Questions: various clinical case questions; describe POC, write goals

title: Clinical Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA) in Jan 2023
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview was very welcoming. Got to know more about the company and felt comfortable speaking with the representative. This was my first interview over the phone, I have my second one today and it’s virtual.
Interview Questions: 1. Tell us about yourself 2. Why CHOC 3. How do you react to a difficult situation

title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at CHOC Children's in Dec 2022
Interview Descriptions: Very easy, remember to be confident in yourself. Do not over think. At the end of the day if they see that you are a caring and passionate person they will see it.
Interview Questions: What was the most difficult situation you have experienced? how did you deal with it ?

title: Registered Respiratory Therapist (RRT) Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA) in Dec 2022
Interview Descriptions: thorough, clinal based questions with director of department and day shift manager. personality questions. somewhat easy interview. gave tour of hospital. very friendly, not too overwhelming. easy and great experience.
Interview Questions: what mode of ventilation on vent have you used, how do you handle situation with physician with you don’t agree with plan of care

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Los Angeles, CA) in Oct 2022
Interview Descriptions: First there was a telephone interview asking about about my interest and then a video interview was set up. Phone interview and video call interview. Interview was approximately 30 minutes long. Had two nurse managers interview me. Received an offer within a week.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work at CHOC

title: Consultant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA) in Aug 2022
Interview Descriptions: Fairly short but concise interview process . Was asked simple questions about consulting and project managing and also asked my experience in my feild lso asked my experience in my feild
Interview Questions: Accreditation and experience were discussed along with team building

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at CHOC Children's
Interview Descriptions: Managers are always very kind, not intimidating. Ask the typical nursing questions. There will most likely be a panel interview made up of the bedside nurses you would work with!
Interview Questions: Describe a time where you had a conflict with a coworker and how did you handle it?

title: Imaging Aide Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA)
Interview Descriptions: Had an over the phone interview and was invited to a second phone interview but with a panel of people instead of one on one and asked why choc, why pediatrics etc.
Interview Questions: What was the most challenging experience you have had with for example a customer and what did you do?

title: Unit Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at CHOC Children's in May 2022
Interview Descriptions: Fairly easy interview. Very kind HR and Managers! I did no prep for the interview and still got an offer. I'd definitely recommend applying to CHOC! They are very supportive and caring.
Interview Questions: Tell me about your resume

title: Health Information Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA) in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interviewer was professional, friendly, and informative. They had already familiarized themselves with my resume and then asked me to further explain some portions. They asked me where I saw myself wanting to be in my profession and genuinely cared about finding ways to help me develop.
Interview Questions: Where do you want to specialize in the HIM field of work?

title: PSR Specialist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at CHOC Children's
Interview Descriptions: Easy and the fast  and processed very quick had my job offer within 4 days and from my Interview day.  It was also surprisingly very easy going the person interviewing me was so nice and funny
Interview Questions: What are your qualifications for this position?

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CHOC Children's
Interview Descriptions: It was alright. Pretty standard process. I applied online and then was called by HR for an interview about 2 weeks later at a mass hiring event. After the panel interview, I was offered a job the day afterwards.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work for CHOC?

title: Foundation Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA)
Interview Descriptions: Awkward. As a POC I felt like they looked down on me and that I wouldn't be a good fit because I didn't fit the white stereotype of a fundraiser.
Interview Questions: What was my work style

title: Registered Nurse, BSN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CHOC Children's
Interview Descriptions: Round 1 interview had you type answers on their website (short or long answers) and had 2 audio recordings. Round 2 interview was in-person with 3 people during the panel
Interview Questions:
Tell me about yourself
What are your strengths and weaknesses

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA) in Jan 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very thorough.  Opportunity to meet with all related Business Unit Managers, including team to be supervised in hiring department.  Very positive experience for those seeking employment with an organization of its caliber.
Interview Questions: Interview panel asked about Management style.

title: Clinical Laboratory Scientist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at CHOC Children's in Aug 2020
Interview Descriptions: It was a phone panel interview but there was only one person asking--the one in charge of the department I am applying for. The questions were mostly based on the questionnaire given to me.
Interview Questions: They asked mostly of my experience and skills on a certain department

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at CHOC Children's
Interview Descriptions: Panel Interview. Manager and bedside nurses were the panel, and only one person interviewed at a time. The interview itself was no more than 30 minutes. There was a standardized interview packet CHOC uses on each candidate. Each person on the panel took turns asking a question.
Interview Questions: Name a time you had conflict with an employee and how you resolved it

title: New Grad RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA) in Dec 2019
Interview Descriptions: Applied online and waited for about 4 weeks before i receieved and interview. It was a group interview with 3 managers from the specific unit I was applying for. They were very kind and welcoming to my answers. They made me feel comfortable. A very positive experience even though i did not receive an offer
Interview Questions: Name a time you had to deal with a difficult patient

title: Clinical Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA) in Oct 2019
Interview Descriptions: I interviewed one-on-one with the unit manager and was contacted by HR with an offer. Interview was conversational like that included questions that were required for the interview to be asked such as basic scenario questions: tell me a time when you went above and beyond.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself Tell me at time when you went above and beyond

title: Sterile Processing Technician Interview
Application Type: The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA) in Oct 2019
Interview Descriptions: First there was a phone interview and than panel (3 people) interview. A lot of questions and all answers were written down by the panel. Very professional and nice. Good atmosphere.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work for Choc?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CHOC Children's in Sept 2019
Interview Descriptions: A few people in the interview. Charge nurse, a scrub tech and someone from HR. It was just a normal interview. They asked me questions about my experience and how I would react in certain situations. They also said I’d hear from them in 2 weeks if not sooner. I never heard back. I even emailed twice just asking if they had filled the position or were still trying to figure things out. It’s been almost a month now and I still haven’t heard back.
Interview Questions: What are your strength and weaknesses?

title: Lab Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Santa Ana, CA) in Aug 2019
Interview Descriptions: Applied took about two weeks to get a response from staffing.  The initial call was to set up a date and appointment time. Interview was about a week out and was told I was have a panel interview . With HR rep and department personnel
Interview Questions: How do you think you would fit in , in our organization

title: New Grad RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CHOC Children's
Interview Descriptions: This was my very first RN interview and I was very nervous. To my surprise, it was not as intimidating as I imagined. The interview process overall took about 4 weeks to get the interview. This was a panel interview with 3 people.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself. Why CHOC?

title: Clerical Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA)
Interview Descriptions: Systematic - general questions. Tell us about your past experiences, where do you see yourself in five years, how do you handle difficult situations with staff or patients?  Tell me about your most difficult challenge.
Interview Questions: About job history and expectations

title: Registered Nurse NICU Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CHOC Children's
Interview Descriptions: It took 3 weeks after applying to be contacted by HR to set up an interview date. Screening and  verification was done by the nurse recruiter and the actual interview was with the two nurse managers of the unit. One of the nurse managers seemed kind but the manager doing most of the interview made me feel uncomfortably intimidated. There was no warmth or smile and it seemed more focused on what kind of tasks I could do when I work at a comparable hospital. If my resume had been gone over beforehand, many of the questions of the interview regarding my skills would have been answered.
Interview Questions: Describe a difficult patient you’ve had and what you had to do.

title: Clinical Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CHOC Children's in Mar 2018
Interview Descriptions: submit application online, receive a phone call to schedule interview, in person interview at the department and then get a call back with the dates of training if you got the job or email if you didn’t
Interview Questions: what’s a situation you had to go out of your comfort zone

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA) in Dec 2017
Interview Descriptions: The five interviewees were very nice and talkative! Unfortunately, the interview started thirty minutes late because some of the workers were not present and the meeting location was also changed three times.  The interview lasted 20 minutes.
Interview Questions: strengths/weaknesses

title: New Grad RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 7 weeks. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA) in Dec 2017
Interview Descriptions: The interview was a panel interview and it was about 40 minutes. Heard back after a week, received a phone call regarding interview. The whole process was about 7 weeks from when online application was submitted.
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself, strengths/weakness, goals

title: Compliance Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA) in Nov 2017
Interview Descriptions: Fine - four person panel interview - fair questions however there was a subtle ageism that crept in the end of the interview. Never heard a single word from them despite follow up on my part.
Interview Questions: Describe a time when you had work through resistance from an auditor

title: Registered Respiratory Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. I interviewed at CHOC Children's
Interview Descriptions: I felt calm,  they were kind and very encouraging. They explained they're level of care and they're attention to detail. I felt this was an amazing place to work.
Interview Questions: What are you're weaknesses?

title: Patient Account Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA)
Interview Descriptions:
spoke about past experiences, systems I knew
things like that.  Asked about specifics like DOFR's, COB, Managed Care contracts
Briefly explained the entire position to me
How I work with other, if I have any limitations for the position mentioned
It went on for awhile, then we spoke about process of interview, hiring, and such
discussed benefits briefly
Interview Questions:
Asked about collections, if I know what an EOB is
similar questions such as do you know what a Credit balance is?
have you ever worked with Medical, Medicare
Asked me about working month end, reading reports, do I work well with others
things like that

title: Clinical Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (New York, NY)
Interview Descriptions: Applied online. Contacted by HR several weeks later to set up an interview with the manager. The interview itself was very natural and friendly and was conducted like a conversation. I was asked a few basic interview questions and was told the roles and responsibilities of the position. Within two weeks, I received a call back and was offered the position.
Interview Questions: Why CHOC? Why pediatrics?

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CHOC Children's
Interview Descriptions: The process was streamline and moved quickly. I appreciated the managers friendly tone which made me feel comfortable during a phone interview. I am grateful that I was selected for an interview at this competitive hospital!
Interview Questions: Behavioral. Where do you want to be in 5 years. Why do you want to be a nurse?

title: Clinical Research Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA)
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was pretty easy. First was a phone interview and then a one on one interview was set up with the Supervisor and Dr's. Background check completed and Drug Screen. Then a New Hire Orientation was completed prior to actually starting the position
Interview Questions: N/A

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at CHOC Children's in Feb 2016
Interview Descriptions: 3 interviews, 2 were with panels. One was management and the other was with some of the team members that you would be working with. People were kind and helpful with questions.
Interview Questions: why do you want to work for CHOC

title: LVN Interview
Application Type: The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Fullerton, CA) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: It took them a month to call me for an interview after I applied. It was a panel interview with a manager, an RN and an LVN that interviewed me. I received a job offer a week after my interview
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work at CHOC

title: New Grad RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA) in Dec 2015
Interview Descriptions: Panel interview of eight people (nurse managers and floor nurses) which was not as intimidating as it sounds since everyone was friendly and welcoming. Asked behavioral questions that I did not anticipate. First nursing interview though so I was super nervous and found this to be a good experience regardless of the no offer.
Interview Questions: 2 weaknesses & 2 strengths?

title: Physical Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Santa Ana, CA)
Interview Descriptions: This was a panel based behavioral interview made up of PT team, supervisors, and managers. There were a lot of questions the started with "give me an example of a time".
Interview Questions: give an example of a time you went above and beyond for customer service

title: Registered Respiratory Therapist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA) in Nov 2015
Interview Descriptions: Small panel  (director and supervisors). They asked about 5 generic questions and about 5 clinical question. Some of the clinical questions were hard.  I heard back after about 2 weeks.
Interview Questions: Name and describe a congenital heart defect

title: Department Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA) in Aug 2015
Interview Descriptions: I have been applying with this hospital since 2011, I finally got an interview. I got a phone call from an HR person to schedule the interview. Day of, I met with three people. A bit intimidating I thought I was only going to meet with one. All were friendly.
Interview Questions: Typical questions. What is your greatest strength/weakness? I was asked about my past employment and school goals.

title: Public Relations Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA) in Jul 2015
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was enjoyable and I had the opportunity to meet with members of several teams. I was pleased to have many pleasant and informative conversations, rather than just standard Q&As.That was a refreshing change to other interviews, and made me feel comfortable with the group. I felt that my time as a candidate was respected and my experience and ideas were valued.
Interview Questions: What will you miss about your current job?

title: Financial Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at CHOC Children's
Interview Descriptions: Brief phone call before being asked to come in for an in-person interview. Met with manager of Financial Planning & Decision Support. Was asked for a 2nd interview with Director of Financial Planning and met with team of analysts. Was asked standard behavioral interview questions and about my experience working in a hospital finance department.
Interview Questions: What is your greatest strength/weakness?

title: Clinical; Associate Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at CHOC Children's
Interview Descriptions: Went in and met with the manager for a one on one interveiw. went well and asked basic interview questions about myself. and how I would be a good assest.
Interview Questions: have you ever been put in a difficult situation when a guest was not happy? and how did you go about it?

title: LVN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA) in Feb 2015
Interview Descriptions: It was a 2 part interview. The first  interview was with a panel of maybe 5 interviewers. They asked pretty straight forward questions and didn't ask anything "tricky." The second interview was with the manager and director (the big bosses) and it was almost exactly the same questions.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: LVN Urology FT Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA) in Feb 2015
Interview Descriptions: The interview was extremely positive. A panel interview consisting of 4 people, charge nurse, LVN, administration, and director. Overall the experience was pleasant. Very nice people although I didn't receive a call back or a courtesy call after a couple attempts at following up. Still a very positive experience.
Interview Questions: Behavioral questions.

title: Compliance Analyst Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at CHOC Children's
Interview Descriptions: Terrible, unprofessional company. I was told I would be contacted "either way" after a certain time but never heard from them again after the first face-to-face interview. I don't think they understand that people are sometimes juggling other options and need an answer so they can move forward.
Interview Questions: What was the biggest mistake you made at work?

title: Department Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA) in Nov 2014
Interview Descriptions:
Interview process was fine, met with the medical director and after that met with the Director of the department.  they had me meet with the LVN and MA and they interviewed me.  That was weird
The medical director kept asking me things about my experience that I had talked about and listed on my resume.
Interview Questions: they asked why I would like to work at CHOC

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA) in Apr 2014
Interview Descriptions: Applied online.  Received a phone call to offer an interview the following week.  At the interview, spoke with 3 charge nurses.  Received a call 2 days later offering me a position
Interview Questions: What type of patients do you like to care for?

title: Telecommunications Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Orange, CA) in Feb 2013
Interview Descriptions: I applied at the end of January,2013. I was called in for a face to face interview about a month later. I interviewed in the morning with the department. very standard interview. was offered a position about 6 hours later! It was an amazing experience especially for some one like me( who loves Peds).
Interview Questions: very standard questions

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at CHOC Children's (Fresno, CA) in Feb 2012
Interview Descriptions: This RN was submitted through a travel registered nurse agency from the east coast via a recruiter.  Resume' sent to Childrens Hosp Orange County and was interviewed within one day for job as RN on hospital inpatient unit however another position was offered.  It was in the Infusion Clinic.  Anothter interview did take place on the following day.  I was informed that I was hired nearly immediately after the interview process.
Interview Questions: Explain a situation you dealth with where an MD was difficult etc.
